name: DevDay Helper
description: Collection of prompts for the DevDay Helper Copilot demo.

prompts.title: Convert agenda selection to JSON
prompts.body: Convert the selected agenda text into a JSON array where each item has keys: title, minutes, goal. Keep minutes as a number.

prompts.title: Enrich JSON with presenters
prompts.body: Please convert the agenda into JSON and add a `presenter` field with an empty string. If a session doesn't list minutes, set minutes to 5 by default.

prompts.title: Add totalMinutes top-level
prompts.body: Convert the agenda into a JSON object with keys `totalMinutes` and `sessions`. `sessions` is an array of session objects (title, minutes, goal). Compute totalMinutes from the sessions.

prompts.title: Explain code for beginners
prompts.body: Explain the `formatAgenda` (or `renderAgenda`) function line-by-line for a new developer.

prompts.title: Refactor to handle missing fields
prompts.body: Refactor the `renderAgenda` function to handle missing goals by inserting 'No description provided' and to ensure total minutes are computed.
